content:
PeerReferralPolicy Enum

Definition

Specifies the policy on sharing referrals between peers.

In this Article

public enum PeerReferralPolicy
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
PeerReferralPolicy

Fields

DoNotShare

Referrals are not shared.
Service

Referral policy is determined by the resolver service.
Share

Referrals are shared.
